term: What does avoiding war lead up to?
content:
however, jay’s one “card” to play is to declare war on them since the last time they did that they won ez dubs with the french
but hamilton tells the british that america does not want to declare war on them before jay gets there; he shows jay’s trump card before he got there
the british had no incentive to give up anything at the negotiating table

leads up to Jay's Treaty
